trans-unit.source: Stores constants, data type information, utility functions, and references to prototype-based objects.
trans-unit.target: 儲存常數、 資料類型資訊、 公用程式函式和原型架構物件的參考。

trans-unit.source: This class belongs to the built-in object model category.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別屬於內建的物件模型類別目錄。

trans-unit.source: Decodes the specified Uniform Resource Identifier (URI), accounting for reserved characters.
trans-unit.target: 解碼指定統一資源識別元 (URI)，保留字元。

trans-unit.source: The URI to decode.
The decoded version of encodedURI.
Decodes the specified Uniform Resource Identifier (URI).
trans-unit.target: 解碼指定的統一資源識別元 (URI)。

trans-unit.source: The URI to decode.
The decoded version of encodedURI.

trans-unit.source: The URI to encode.
The encoded version of uri.

A reference to an <xref href="Microsoft.JScript.EnumeratorConstructor"></xref> object.
Gets a reference to an <xref href="Microsoft.JScript.ErrorConstructor"></xref> object.
A reference to an <xref href="Microsoft.JScript.ErrorConstructor"></xref> object.
Converts the specified string to use the % character to escape reserved characters (@, *, _, +, -, ., /) and express them in Unicode notation.
trans-unit.target: 轉換指定要用於 %字元逸出保留的字元的字串 (@、 *、 _、 +、-，。，/) 和 Unicode 表示法來表達這些。

trans-unit.source: The string to convert.
A new copy of string in which the reserved characters are escaped by the % character and expressed in Unicode.
trans-unit.target: 新副本 string 中保留的字元是由 %字元逸出以 Unicode 表示。

trans-unit.source: Throws an <xref href="Microsoft.JScript.JSError"></xref> exception in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 擲回<xref href="Microsoft.JScript.JSError"></xref>在所有情況下的例外狀況。

The ProgID of the object.
The managed object.

This field is constant.

if num can be converted to a JScript number; otherwise, .

Converts the specified string to its <xref:System.Double> equivalent.
The string to convert.
A value equivalent to the value that is contained in string.
trans-unit.target: 中所包含的值等於值 string 。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string to its <xref:System.Double> equivalent, using the specified base.
trans-unit.target: 指定將字串轉換成其<xref:System.Double>同等權限，使用指定的基底。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The string to convert.
A number between 2 and 36 that represents the base of the number system that `string` is expressed in.
trans-unit.target: A 編號 2 到 36 表示之間的數字系統基底`string`以表示。

trans-unit.source: The default is 10.
A value that is equivalent to the value that is contained in string.
trans-unit.target: 值，相當於中所包含的值 string 。

Converts % escaped characters (@, *, _, +, -, ., /) in the specified string to their original form.
trans-unit.target: 轉換 %逸出字元 (@，*，_、 +、-、。，/) 中指定的字串為其原始形式。

trans-unit.source: The escaped characters are expressed in Unicode notation.
trans-unit.target: 逸出的字元會以 Unicode 表示法來表示。

trans-unit.source: The string to convert.
A new copy of string in which the escaped characters are converted to their original form.
trans-unit.target: 新副本 string 中的逸出的字元都轉換成其原始形式。
